title: Krishnamurti-Exploring the Essence of Love-Ojai 82-[AUDIO ONLY]
description:
Jiddu Krishnamurti is one of the most significant and profound thinker of the twentieth century. The world is full of &#039;spiritual&#039; nonsense, and Krishnamurti speaks to us in a most intelligent, relevant and deeper way. This series of 6 talks, titled "Exploring the Essence of Love", was recorded in Ojai, California in 1982. Each talk is a little over an hour.  If you are already familiar with Krishnamurti&#039;s work you won&#039;t be surprised by the quality of the content. 

These are the same talks as the videos floating around @ 3.9GB. However people with a low internet bandwith may be having a tough time with the large download so here&#039;s the audio-only version at less than 1/10th the size. The quality is 96-128 Kbps, which is perfectly adequate for these talks.


Titles included in "Exploring the Essence of Love":

Intro (Short clip from a Q&A in Saanen)
Holistic Observation: Ojai 1982, Talk 1 
Crisis in Ourselves: Ojai 1982, Talk 2 
Thought and Disorder: Ojai 1982, Talk 3 
The Content of One&#039;s Consciousness: Ojai 1982, Talk 4 
On the Nature of Love: Ojai 1982, Talk 5 
Meditation & the Thinking Machine: Ojai 1982, Talk 6
